note: Schooled Nyasaland/Malawi (I was there during Independence), Jordan, then UK Graduated in law, married a Saudi ( didn’t go well) Worked in Admin NHS - retired as Medical Herbalist Love films (mostly old, horror, Scandi noir), reading, knitting, cooking, politics, countryside.
